Topic.Title: Ask the twit about his 2002 taxes

Message.Msg: Personal Information: His full Name is: Willard Mitt Romney. He was Born: March 12, 1947 and is 65 years old. His Father: George W. Romney, former Governor of the State of Michigan. He was raised in Bloomfield Hills, Michigan. He is Married to Ann Romney since 1969; they five children. Education: B.A. From Brigham Young University,J.D. and M.B.A. from Harvard University. Religion: Mormon - The Church of Jesus Christ of the Latter-Day Saints Working Background: After high school, he spent 30 months in France as a Mormon missionary. After going to both Harvard Business School and Harvard Law School simultaneously, he passed the Michigan bar exam, but never worked as an attorney. In 1984, he co-founded Bain Capital a private equity investment firm, one of the largest such firms in the United States . In 1994, he ran for Senator of Massachusetts and lost to Ted Kennedy. He was President and CEO of the 2002 Winter Olympic Games. In 2002, he was elected Governor of the State of Massachusetts where he eliminated a 1.5 billion deficit. Some Interesting Facts about Romney: Bain Capital, starting with one small office supply store in Massachusetts, turned it into Staples; now over 2,000 stores employing 90,000 people. Bain Capital also worked to perform the same kinds of business miracles again and again, with companies like Domino's, Sealy, Brookstone, Weather Channel, Burger King, Warner Music Group, Dollarama, Home Depot Supply and many others. He was an unpaid volunteer campaign worker for his dad's gubernatorial campaign 1 year. He was an unpaid intern in his dad's governor's office for eight years. He was an unpaid bishop and state president of his church for ten years. He was an unpaid President of the Salt Lake Olympic Committee for three years. He took no salary and was the unpaid Governor of Massachusetts for four years. He gave his entire inheritance from his father to charity. Mitt Romney is one of the wealthiest self-made men in our country but has returned more to its citizens in terms of money, service and time than most men. In 2011, Mitt Romney gave over $4 million to charity, almost 19% of his income... Just for comparison purposes, Obama gave 1% and Joe Biden gave $300 or .0013%. Mitt Romney is Trustworthy: He will show us his birth certificate. He will show us his high school and college transcripts. He will show us his social security card. He will show us his law degree. He will show us his draft notice. He will show us his medical records. He will show us his income tax records. He will show us he has nothing to hide. Mitt Romney's background, experience and trustworthiness show him to be a great leader and an excellent candidate for President of the United States . You may think that Romney might not be the best representative the Republicans could have selected, but at least - I know what religion he is, and that he won't desecrate the flag of the United States, bow down to foreign powers, or practice fiscal irresponsibility. I know he has the ability to turn this financial debacle that the current regime has gotten us into. We won't like all the things necessary to recover from this debt, but someone with Romney's background can do it. However, on the minus side, he never was a "Community Organizer", never took drugs or smoked pot, never got drunk, did not associate with communists or terrorists, nor did he attend a church whose pastor called for G.od to d.amn the US. [Oooops!]

Just when I was beginning to think you might have half a brain, you post something like this. The Democrats way to get money out of politics is bail out Solendra if they agree to share the bailout money with those who approve the bailout. Raise the debt limit three times and never approve a budget.

Topic.Title: Ask the twit about his 2002 taxes

Message.Msg: Scooch the taxes for him ... I care about me ... We make around 80K ... property tax on my average home and auto is 9K, state income tax 6.25% or 5100 ... medicare/soc sec = app another 5500 ... fed income tax app. 12,500 ... add state sales tax app 1200 total = 33,300 or so .... all together 40% of my income goes to some form of tax ... when 50% of our country pays no income tax and app 40% of the country receives some form of entitlement ... folks like me ( lower middle class ) could give shxt about what Romney gets taxed but what the President/Congress and local politicians will do to give me back part of my earnings ! ... so far Obama has not done well in that area ... I am an independent voter who is fairly liberal socially but has to draw the line fiscally ... else I start to wonder why I don't just get in line with my hand out, instead of in my pocket !

Romney became a multi millionaire BEFORE he entered politics. Obama became a multi millionaire only AFTER he entered politics! Yeah, he's the "common man". More like the "lowest commom denominator" of sleazy politicians!
